lead_paragraph: To the Editor: In the Nov. 20 editorial ''Pressing for a Mideast Cease-Fire,'' you state that Secretary of State Colin L. Powell's speech about the Middle East provides Israel reassurance that it would not be asked to sacrifice legitimate security interests ''to the needs of the antiterror coalition.'' It's already too late. The United States has repeatedly criticized Israel in recent days for pursuing terrorists who seek safe havens in Palestinian-controlled areas in order to appease Arab coalition nations.
abstract: Joshua Hasten letter says US, waging war on global terrorism, must also recognize Israel's legitimate right to pursue those who have committed terrorist acts (S)
